title: Apple Introduces New AirPods Pro Charging Case and EarPods With USB-C
content:
In addition to the iPhone 15 models getting a USB-C port, Apple today announced that the second-generation AirPods Pro are now available with a USB-C charging case, and the wired EarPods have been released with a USB-C connector as well.


The second-generation AirPods Pro now ship with a USB-C charging case, but the case does not appear to be sold separately at this time. There are no other changes to the AirPods Pro.
Tag: September 2023 Apple Event

This article, "Apple Introduces New AirPods Pro Charging Case and EarPods With USB-C" first appeared on MacRumors.com
